name: Huntail
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can’t attack or retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Threaten and Drop
attacks.effect: If Huntail has any {D} Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage and discard a Special Energy card, if any, attached to the Defending Pokémon.
